title: NSW Pushes Ahead With Toughest-in-Country Gun & Protest Reforms Amid Legal Challenges | 10 News
description: The New South Wales government is pushing ahead with its sweeping gun and protest crackdown.   An all-night parliamentary sitting saw the lower house pass reforms billed as being the toughest in the country.  But today - as it was fiercely debated in the upper house - a constitutional challenge in the courts, was already being mounted. title: Prime Minister Requests Major Changes To Travel Entitlements For Federal Politicians | 10 News

Federal politics reporter Matthew Karstunen joins me at the desk. title: Senior Russian General Killed In Moscow Car Bomb, Zelenskyy Fears Possible Russian Strike | 10 News
description: A senior Russian general has been killed by a car bomb in Moscow, in what the Kremlin suspects was a targeted assassination by Ukraine.  Peace talks continue at a frustratingly slow pace - with President Zelenskyy now fearing a massive strike by Russia over Christmas. title: Libyan Army Chief Mohammed Al-Haddad Dies In Türkiye Plane Crash | 10 News
description: Libya’s army chief of staff, Mohammed Ali Ahmed al-Haddad, has died after a military jet crashed shortly after departing Türkiye’s capital, Ankara.  Turkish authorities said the jet requested an emergency landing before crashing in a rural district south of Ankara, with debris later located by search teams.  Libya’s prime minister said radio contact was lost with the aircraft as it travelled to Tripoli, carrying Haddad and four others.  The cause of the crash is not yet known. The incident comes a day after Türkiye extended the mandate of its military deployment in Libya, where it backs the Tripoli-based government. title: Norwegian Tourist Terrorised By A Gang Of Youths At St Kilda Beach, Melbourne | 10 News
description: What should have been the quintessential Australian beach holiday has ended in violence for a Norwegian tourist in Melbourne.   The 34-year-old was assaulted and robbed by a gang of youths in the middle of the day at St Kilda his attackers tonight on the run. title: Former Prince Andrew Believed To Feature Heavily In Latest Jeffrey Epstein Files Drop | 10 News
description: Emails from a new batch of Epstein Files appear to show Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor - the former Duke of York - requesting 'inappropriate friends' from one of the convicted pedophile's close associates. title: Two ISIS Terrorists Found Guilty Of Planning Attack On Jewish Community In Manchester, UK | 10 News
description: A British court has found two men guilty of planning an attack on Jews in Manchester in what police believe could have been the UK's worst terror attack.  One of the men was arrested by heavily armed police in a car park in Bolton, as he was taking delivery of three guns and hundreds of rounds of ammunition. title: Rare White Christmas As Snow Hits Tasmania For First Time In Decades | 10 News
description: While many headed for the beach, sunshine was in short supply in the nation’s south, where Tasmanians experienced a rare white Christmas.  It’s the first time snow has fallen in Australia on December 25 in almost two decades. title: Jewish Community Shaken After Melbourne Rabbi’s Car Firebombed | 10 News
description: The Jewish community has been left shaken once again after a prominent Melbourne rabbi’s car was firebombed overnight.  Community leaders have condemned the attack as another act of antisemitism, saying enough is enough.
